name: Clawi
tag_list: children-games, online-games, free-to-play-games, free-games, virtual-world, latin-america, spain, brazil, argentina, mexico, colombia, peru, chile
overview:
MundoGaturro.com is a virtual world for children from 4 to 12 years old. Based on a very well-known comic strip character -Gaturro-, mundogaturro.com started operations in March 2010 in Argentina and very soon obtained a solid and growing community coming from all the countries in the region.

With more than 6,000,000 users, it is now one of the leading online platform for spanish speaking countries in Latin America and Spain.

A portuguese version (www.mundogaturrorecreio.com.br) was launched in May 2012 to target children in Brazil and Portugal.

Other products have been added to the platform to generate an online ecosystem for children, including a social network(Picapon), an community video portal (Picapon Videos), an online music radio (Radio Mundo Gaturro) and soon a VOD platform.

Visit www.mundogaturro.com and join the most prominent online children community in Latin America.
